segments.text: I notice the girl standing there with her hand out, just waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this whole mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is the one risking his life on that stool, and she’s just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so sure he’s going to hand her a cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while he’s up there balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s going on right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s just standing there waiting is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so strange and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
